solver.search.loop.lns.neighbors

Interface INeighbor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityBasedNeighborhood, AdaptiveNeighborhood, ANeighbor, ExplainingCut, ExplainingObjective, PGN4Explanation, PropagationGuidedNeighborhood, RandomNeighborhood, RandomNeighborhood4Explanation, ReversePropagationGuidedNeighborhood, RPGN4Explanation, SequenceNeighborhood

    public interface INeighbor
    An interface defining services required for the LNS to select variables to freeze-unfreeze.
    Since:
    18/06/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activeFastRestart()
      This method is called by LargeNeighborhoodSearch on the first solution, it activates the fast restart strategy
      void fastRestart(ACounter counter)
      Plug a fast restart strategy to the neighborhood
      void fixSomeVariables(ICause cause)
      Freezes some variables in order to have a fast computation
      boolean isSearchComplete() 
      void recordSolution()
      Record values of decision variables to freeze some ones during the next LNS run
      void restrictLess()
      Use less restriction at the beginning of a LNS run in order to get better solutions Called when no solution was found during a LNS run (trapped into a local optimum)

    • Method Detail

      • recordSolution

        void recordSolution()
        Record values of decision variables to freeze some ones during the next LNS run

      • fixSomeVariables

        void fixSomeVariables(ICause cause)
                      throws ContradictionException
        Freezes some variables in order to have a fast computation
        Parameters:
        cause - the LNS
        Throws:
        ContradictionException - if variables have been fixed to inconsistent values this can happen if fixed variables cannot yield to a better solution than the last one a contradiction is raised because a cut has been posted on the objective function Notice that it could be used to generate a no-good

      • restrictLess

        void restrictLess()
        Use less restriction at the beginning of a LNS run in order to get better solutions Called when no solution was found during a LNS run (trapped into a local optimum)

      • isSearchComplete

        boolean isSearchComplete()
        Returns:
        true iff the search is in a complete mode (no fixed variable)

      • fastRestart

        void fastRestart(ACounter counter)
        Plug a fast restart strategy to the neighborhood
        Parameters:
        counter - a counter

      • activeFastRestart

        void activeFastRestart()
        This method is called by LargeNeighborhoodSearch on the first solution, it activates the fast restart strategy
